text: 9.4 Kis 4.22, 9.4, Lo 7.6, 14.1-2, Apo 3.25, 13.22, Epe 2.12, Hib 8.8-10, 9.1 Binɨb anɨb okok, Yislel binɨb mɨdebal. God kɨlop agek ñapay ne mɨdel, kɨles ne ak mɨlek tep ne ak kɨlop yomek nɨgɨlak. Ne kɨlop takaw ag adek nokom lɨl, takaw ne agek Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨlop ñak. God ne kɨli yɨp anɨgɨl kɨgom yɨmɨl agnɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, anɨb anɨb gɨnɨmɨb ak agek anɨgɨlak. Tap olap gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak okok kɨlop agñak.
